attributes.review:
Once I opened this app my hamster died, would not recommend if you have a hamster 
And I don’t want “bunker boy” as president again literally what the heck did he even do beside hold a bible upside down
attributes.title: My hamster died

attributes.review: throw the whole app away it gave me horrible nightmares of donald trump actually being our president again. i sincerely hope you never download this app it gave off very RACIST energies that homegirl don't condone 🎅🏽😌🌛🤟🏽✨🐐and it's glitch too. tehe
attributes.title: BAD UGLY RACIST VIBEZ✨🐐🤡🌛

attributes.review: Crash after bug after lag after buffer.... annoyed
attributes.title: Why does it continue to crash!!

attributes.review: Honestly I felt like cutting my hair to whatever hair style that annoying orange dude had as soon as i downloaded this. Also felt like kicking people out of my house for no reason. Bad vibes yo bad vibes.
attributes.title: tonald drump 2020 (in prison)

attributes.review: I loved the trump campaign until i got this app, it is such a scam. I am not going to do all the work for him to win. I refuse to do so called “phone banking” or “door-to-door knocking.” I am now officially team Biden. #Biden2020🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️
attributes.title: Just No.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my bae😎 then was horrified to realize 🤭 IT GAVE ME AN ABORTION😭 as you fellow trump supporters know 👁👄👁 getting rid of a clump of cells is a big no no 😪 I’m so disappointed will not be voting for him again 😤😭🤯
attributes.title: I can’t believe it 😱

attributes.review: I thought the information would be reliable and usefull but this is fake news.
attributes.title: Fake news

attributes.review: I downloaded to support bunker boi and all the sudden a CHETTO pops out of the screen and starts strangling me😠😠. I was all for 🇺🇸🤪MAGA🤪🇺🇸 before this happened. But now I can’t STAND bunker boi president. So now I will be voting for ANONYMOUS this election.            Anonymous 2020🥳🥳
attributes.title: I almost DIED❌👄❌

attributes.review: Got my phone hacked and it kept on glitching,thought our amazing president could do better. okay quality
attributes.title: it doesn’t work

attributes.review: i downloaded it and now i have anxiety. 😫gross 🤢and a racist goblin came out of my phone and tried to eat my rabbit😡the goblin won’t leave now and he’s trying to eat my curtains. i don’t recommend this app if you don’t want the responsibility of a mean pet goblin. oh and the goblin doesn’t like it when i play the phantom of the opera soundtrack😬eek red flag right there
attributes.title: this app gave me my mental illnesses
